text: Pavol Paška (23 February 1958 – 6 April 2018) was a Slovak politician. He served as Speaker of the National Council of the Slovak Republic from 2006 to 2010 and again from 2012 to 2014. He was a member of the Direction - Social Democracy (Smer-SD) party. Paška was a member of Prague Society for International Cooperation Paška died of cardiac arrest on 6 April 2018 in Košice, Slovakia at the age of 60.Pavol Paška dies ==References== ==Other websites== * Paška's page on the Homepage of the National Council * Category:1958 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:Slovak politicians
title: Pavol Paška
